targets.rawSql:
WITH date_series AS (
    SELECT generate_series(MIN(DATE(timestamp)), MAX(DATE(timestamp)), '1 day')::date AS date
    FROM erc20_balance
),
grouped_data AS (
    SELECT 
        address,
        account,
        DATE(timestamp) as entry_date,
        balance,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY address, account, DATE(timestamp) ORDER BY timestamp DESC) as rn
    FROM 
        erc20_balance 
    WHERE address = '0x856c4efb76c1d1ae02e20ceb03a2a6a08b0b8dc3'
)
SELECT 
    ds.date as time,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e6 AND balance < 1e12) AS ">= .000000000001",
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e12 AND balance < 1e13) AS ">= .000001",
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e13 AND balance < 1e14) AS ">= .00001",
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e14 AND balance < 1e15) AS ">= .0001",
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e15 AND balance < 1e16) AS ">= .001",
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e16 AND balance < 1e17) AS ">= .01",
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e17 AND balance < 1e18) AS ">= .1",
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e18 AND balance < 1e19) AS ">= 1",
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e19 AND balance < 1e20) AS ">= 10",
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e20 AND balance < 1e21) AS ">= 100",
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e21) AS ">= 1000"
FROM 
    date_series ds
LEFT JOIN 
    grouped_data gd ON ds.date = gd.entry_date AND gd.rn = 1
WHERE address = '0x856c4efb76c1d1ae02e20ceb03a2a6a08b0b8dc3'
  and $__timeFilter(ds.date) 
GROUP BY ds.date
ORDER BY ds.date asc;

panels.description: Origin held OETH not yet excluded.

targets.rawSql:
WITH date_series AS (
    SELECT generate_series(MIN(DATE(timestamp)), MAX(DATE(timestamp)), '1 day')::date AS date
    FROM erc20_balance
),
grouped_data AS (
    SELECT 
        address,
        account,
        DATE(timestamp) as entry_date,
        balance,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY address, account, DATE(timestamp) ORDER BY timestamp DESC) as rn
    FROM 
        erc20_balance 
    WHERE address = '0x856c4efb76c1d1ae02e20ceb03a2a6a08b0b8dc3'
)
SELECT 
    ds.date as time,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e6 AND balance < 1e12) AS ">= .000000000001",
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e12 AND balance < 1e13) AS ">= .000001",
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e13 AND balance < 1e14) AS ">= .00001",
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e14 AND balance < 1e15) AS ">= .0001",
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e15 AND balance < 1e16) AS ">= .001",
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e16 AND balance < 1e17) AS ">= .01",
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e17 AND balance < 1e18) AS ">= .1",
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e18 AND balance < 1e19) AS ">= 1",
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e19 AND balance < 1e20) AS ">= 10",
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e20 AND balance < 1e21) AS ">= 100",
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e21) AS ">= 1000"
FROM 
    date_series ds
LEFT JOIN 
    grouped_data gd ON ds.date = gd.entry_date AND gd.rn = 1
WHERE address = '0x856c4efb76c1d1ae02e20ceb03a2a6a08b0b8dc3'
  and $__timeFilter(ds.date) 
GROUP BY ds.date
ORDER BY ds.date desc
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: Holder Counts

targets.rawSql:
WITH date_series AS (
    SELECT generate_series(MIN(DATE(timestamp)), MAX(DATE(timestamp)), '1 day')::date AS date
    FROM erc20_balance
),
grouped_data AS (
    SELECT 
        address,
        account,
        DATE(timestamp) as entry_date,
        balance,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY address, account, DATE(timestamp) ORDER BY timestamp DESC) as rn
    FROM 
        erc20_balance 
    WHERE address = '0x856c4efb76c1d1ae02e20ceb03a2a6a08b0b8dc3'
)
SELECT 
    ds.date as time,
    SUM(balance / 1e18) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e6 AND balance < 1e12) / SUM(balance / 1e18) AS ">= .000000000001",
    SUM(balance / 1e18) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e12 AND balance < 1e13) / SUM(balance / 1e18) AS ">= .000001",
    SUM(balance / 1e18) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e13 AND balance < 1e14) / SUM(balance / 1e18) AS ">= .00001",
    SUM(balance / 1e18) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e14 AND balance < 1e15) / SUM(balance / 1e18) AS ">= .0001",
    SUM(balance / 1e18) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e15 AND balance < 1e16) / SUM(balance / 1e18) AS ">= .001",
    SUM(balance / 1e18) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e16 AND balance < 1e17) / SUM(balance / 1e18) AS ">= .01",
    SUM(balance / 1e18) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e17 AND balance < 1e18) / SUM(balance / 1e18) AS ">= .1",
    SUM(balance / 1e18) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e18 AND balance < 1e19) / SUM(balance / 1e18) AS ">= 1",
    SUM(balance / 1e18) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e19 AND balance < 1e20) / SUM(balance / 1e18) AS ">= 10",
    SUM(balance / 1e18) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e20 AND balance < 1e21) / SUM(balance / 1e18) AS ">= 100",
    SUM(balance / 1e18) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e21) / SUM(balance / 1e18) AS ">= 1000"
FROM 
    date_series ds
LEFT JOIN 
    grouped_data gd ON ds.date = gd.entry_date AND gd.rn = 1
WHERE address = '0x856c4efb76c1d1ae02e20ceb03a2a6a08b0b8dc3'
  and $__timeFilter(ds.date) 
GROUP BY ds.date
ORDER BY ds.date asc;

targets.rawSql:
WITH date_series AS (
    SELECT generate_series(MIN(DATE(timestamp)), MAX(DATE(timestamp)), '1 day')::date AS date
    FROM erc20_balance
),
grouped_data AS (
    SELECT 
        address,
        account,
        DATE(timestamp) as entry_date,
        balance,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY address, account, DATE(timestamp) ORDER BY timestamp DESC) as rn
    FROM 
        erc20_balance 
    WHERE address = '0x856c4efb76c1d1ae02e20ceb03a2a6a08b0b8dc3'
)
SELECT 
    ds.date as time,
    SUM(balance / 1e18) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e6 AND balance < 1e12) / SUM(balance / 1e18) AS ">= .000000000001",
    SUM(balance / 1e18) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e12 AND balance < 1e13) / SUM(balance / 1e18) AS ">= .000001",
    SUM(balance / 1e18) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e13 AND balance < 1e14) / SUM(balance / 1e18) AS ">= .00001",
    SUM(balance / 1e18) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e14 AND balance < 1e15) / SUM(balance / 1e18) AS ">= .0001",
    SUM(balance / 1e18) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e15 AND balance < 1e16) / SUM(balance / 1e18) AS ">= .001",
    SUM(balance / 1e18) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e16 AND balance < 1e17) / SUM(balance / 1e18) AS ">= .01",
    SUM(balance / 1e18) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e17 AND balance < 1e18) / SUM(balance / 1e18) AS ">= .1",
    SUM(balance / 1e18) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e18 AND balance < 1e19) / SUM(balance / 1e18) AS ">= 1",
    SUM(balance / 1e18) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e19 AND balance < 1e20) / SUM(balance / 1e18) AS ">= 10",
    SUM(balance / 1e18) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e20 AND balance < 1e21) / SUM(balance / 1e18) AS ">= 100",
    SUM(balance / 1e18) FILTER (WHERE balance >= 1e21) / SUM(balance / 1e18) AS ">= 1000"
FROM 
    date_series ds
LEFT JOIN 
    grouped_data gd ON ds.date = gd.entry_date AND gd.rn = 1
WHERE address = '0x856c4efb76c1d1ae02e20ceb03a2a6a08b0b8dc3'
  and $__timeFilter(ds.date)
GROUP BY ds.date
ORDER BY ds.date desc
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: Holder TVL %

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  frx_eth / 1000000000000000000 as frx_eth,
  r_eth / 1000000000000000000 as r_eth,
  st_eth / 1000000000000000000 as st_eth,
  weth / 1000000000000000000 as weth
FROM oeth_vault
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  total_supply / 1e18 as total_supply,
  rebasing_supply / 1e18 as rebasing_supply,
  non_rebasing_supply / 1e18 as non_rebasing_supply
FROM oeth
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  apy7_day_avg,
  apy14_day_avg,
  apy30_day_avg,
  apy
FROM oethapy
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  yield_eth / 1e18 as yield
FROM o_token_rebase
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND chain_id = 1 AND otoken = '0x856c4efb76c1d1ae02e20ceb03a2a6a08b0b8dc3'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  fee_eth / 1e18 as fee
FROM o_token_rebase
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND chain_id = 1 AND otoken = '0x856c4efb76c1d1ae02e20ceb03a2a6a08b0b8dc3'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  asset AS metric,
  balance / 1e18 as balance
FROM strategy_balance
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  strategy = '0x1827f9ea98e0bf96550b2fc20f7233277fcd7e63'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  asset AS metric,
  balance / 1e18 as balance
FROM strategy_balance
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  strategy = '0x3ff8654d633d4ea0fae24c52aec73b4a20d0d0e5'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  asset AS metric,
  balance / 1e18 as balance
FROM strategy_balance
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  strategy = '0xc1fc9e5ec3058921ea5025d703cbe31764756319'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  asset AS metric,
  balance / 1e18 as balance
FROM strategy_balance
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  strategy = '0x49109629ac1deb03f2e9b2fe2ac4a623e0e7dfdc'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  balance0 / 1e18 as balance0,
  balance1 / 1e18 as balance1
FROM curve_pool_balance
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  address = '0x94b17476a93b3262d87b9a326965d1e91f9c13e7'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  balance0,
  balance1
FROM curve_pool_balance
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  address = '0x94b17476a93b3262d87b9a326965d1e91f9c13e7'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  balance0 / 1e18 as balance0,
  balance1 / 1e18 as balance1
FROM curve_pool_balance
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  address = '0x828b154032950c8ff7cf8085d841723db2696056'

SELECT

WHERE

SELECT

FROM curve_pool_balance

  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND

FROM curve_pool_balance
WHERE

  balance1 / 1e18 as balance1
FROM curve_pool_balance
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  address = '0xa1f8a6807c402e4a15ef4eba36528a3fed24e577'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  balance0,
  balance1
FROM curve_pool_balance
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  address = '0xa1f8a6807c402e4a15ef4eba36528a3fed24e577'

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  balance0 / 1e18 as balance0,
  balance1 / 1e18 as balance1
FROM curve_pool_balance
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  address = '0x0f3159811670c117c372428d4e69ac32325e4d0f'

  "timestamp" AS "time",

  balance1
FROM curve_pool_balance
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  address = '0x0f3159811670c117c372428d4e69ac32325e4d0f'

  "timestamp" AS "time",
  eth_owned / 1e18 as eth_owned,
  oeth_owned / 1e18 as oeth_owned
FROM oeth_curve_lp
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  sfrx_eth / 1e18 as sfrx_eth
FROM oeth_frax_staking
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp")

  weth / 1e18 as weth
FROM oeth_balancer_meta_pool_strategy
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp")
ORDER BY 1
